To all those nice folks who said to me, “I wish there was an easy way to give @Netlify a bit of money each month for what I do on the free tier” Add Netlify Analytics to one of your sites for $9 per month and you’ll have done that. 🤗 (And you’ll get built-in analytics too!) https://t.co/AXOQnaXFvd
